seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is an Indian SaaS-based digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

pricing_models.type: Flat fee plus user license fees
pricing_models.description: Whatfix pricing is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees.
pricing_models.duration: Annual billing, term length varies based on contract

pricing_models.description: Whatfix offers a free plan with 30 credits.
Whatfix offers a basic plan at $39 per month.

buyer_research.name: Equinix
buyer_research.description: Equinix is the world's digital infrastructure company. Digital leaders harness Equinix's trusted platform to bring together and interconnect the foundational infrastructure that shapes the world's digital future.
goals: To bring together foundational infrastructure that shapes the world's digital future
challenges: Competition from other digital infrastructure companies

competitors.name: WalkMe
pros: Boost digital adoption at scale with confidence
Robust governance, privacy, and security standards

competitors.name: Userpilot
pros: Wide range of features and use cases
cons: Not the most non-technical people-friendly feature adoption tool
differentiators: Increase growth metrics at every stage of the user journey

pains: Challenges in bringing together foundational infrastructure that shapes the world's digital future
Competition from other digital infrastructure companies
Need for better user adoption of digital infrastructure
Limited employee training and performance support
objections: Whatfix is too expensive for our company size
We are already invested in another digital adoption platform
Whatfix might not align with our existing workflows and systems
We are unsure about the scalability of Whatfix
Whatfix might have a steep learning curve for our employees
We are concerned about the customization options in Whatfix
Whatfix might not provide the required level of support for our employees
Whatfix might not have the necessary features for our specific use cases
We need to see more case studies and success stories from similar companies

messages.content: Hi, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today! My name is [Whatfix Sales Person], and I'm excited to learn more about Equinix's goals and challenges. Can you start by telling me a little bit about your role and what brings you to this conversation?

Hi, thanks for having me. I'm [Equinix Team], and I'm part of the digital infrastructure team. We're always looking for ways to improve our digital transformation and user adoption, so I'm interested in learning more about Whatfix and how it can help us achieve our goals.
That's great to hear! Can you tell me more about your current digital transformation initiatives and what you're hoping to achieve with them?

We're trying to interconnect industry-leading organizations and bring together foundational infrastructure that shapes the world's digital future. It's a big undertaking, and we're facing some challenges in terms of AI investment concerns and data center demand.

I understand. It sounds like you're facing some complex challenges. Have you considered how digital adoption platforms like Whatfix can help you accelerate your digital transformation and improve user adoption?
We've looked at a few different options, but we're not sure if they're the right fit for us. We're concerned about the customization options and scalability of some of the platforms we've looked at.

I completely understand. Customization and scalability are important considerations when it comes to digital adoption platforms. Can you tell me more about what you mean by customization options? Are there specific features or workflows that you need to integrate with?

We have a lot of complex workflows and systems, and we need a platform that can integrate with those seamlessly. We're also looking for a platform that can provide real-time feedback and analytics so we can track our progress and make data-driven decisions.

Whatfix can definitely help you with that. Our platform provides real-time feedback and analytics, and we have a robust API that allows for seamless integration with your existing workflows and systems. We also have a lot of experience working with enterprise companies like yours, so I think we could be a good fit.
That sounds promising. Can you tell me more about your pricing model and how it would work for a company of our size?

Our pricing model is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees. We also offer a free plan with 30 credits, as well as a basic plan at $39 per month. For a company of your size, we would likely recommend our enterprise plan, which would involve a custom quote based on your specific needs and requirements.
Okay, that makes sense. We'll need to discuss this further internally, but I think we're interested in moving forward with a pilot or proof-of-concept. What would be the next steps in that process?

I'm glad to hear that! The next step would be to schedule a meeting with our implementation team to discuss the details of the pilot or proof-of-concept. We would work with you to design a customized plan that meets your specific needs and requirements, and then we would implement the solution and provide training and support to ensure your success.
Sounds good. I think we're ready to move forward with that. Thank you for your time today, and we'll be in touch soon.
You're welcome! It was great speaking with you, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon. Have a great day!

pain_points: Improving digital transformation and user adoption
Customization options and scalability of digital adoption platforms
Tracking progress and making data-driven decisions
objections: Concerns about customization options and scalability
Uncertainty about the right fit for their needs
success_indicators: Track progress and make data-driven decisions

discovery_questions: Can you start by telling me a little bit about your role and what brings you to this conversation?
Can you tell me more about your current digital transformation initiatives and what you're hoping to achieve with them?
What do you mean by customization options? Are there specific features or workflows that you need to integrate with?

objection_resolution_pairs.objection: Concerns about customization options and scalability
objection_resolution_pairs.resolution: Our platform provides real-time feedback and analytics, and we have a robust API that allows for seamless integration with your existing workflows and systems.

objection_resolution_pairs.objection: Uncertainty about the right fit for their needs
objection_resolution_pairs.resolution: We have a lot of experience working with enterprise companies like yours, so I think we could be a good fit.

insights: Equinix is trying to interconnect industry-leading organizations and bring together foundational infrastructure that shapes the world's digital future.
Equinix is facing some challenges in terms of AI investment concerns and data center demand.
Equinix needs a platform that can integrate with their complex workflows and systems, and provide real-time feedback and analytics.
improvements: The seller could have asked more questions about the buyer's current digital transformation initiatives and how Whatfix can help achieve their goals.
The seller could have provided more details about the implementation process and how Whatfix can address the buyer's concerns about customization options and scalability.
